item.title: Fox Corp 10-K
item.description: Fox Corp, which is in the Television Broadcasting Stations [4833] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 10, 2021 had 41349 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 1062 instances fox - 529 instances financial - 348 instances 2021 - 339 instances 2020 - 311 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
